mapper.select: select * from final.order where user_no=#{value} order by order_no desc
SELECT DAYNAME(order_date) AS dayName, SUM(order_price) AS sale_count FROM final.order WHERE order_date >= DATE_SUB(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(NOW()) DAY) GROUP BY DAYNAME(order_date);
SELECT o.order_set, o.order_date, u.user_name, SUM(o.order_price) AS total_order_price FROM final.order AS o JOIN user AS u ON o.user_no = u.user_no GROUP BY o.order_set, u.user_name
